body_html:
Thanks for the pointer @aselle, and thanks for the clear bug report @hugman!

Indeed we can't dedicate much time to supporting tf.contrib code, especially not with XLA at the moment.

However I am interested in looking into this issue, since it may uncover weird bugs. @hugman, can you provide a log of the same code with XLA disabled, to let me know what normal convergence looks like for you?

I can't promise when I'll have time to take a look, but it'll be useful for a rainy day, just not today. :)

However I am interested in looking into this issue, since it may uncover weird bugs.  @hugman, can you provide a log of the same code with XLA disabled, to let me know what normal convergence looks like for you?

body:
Thanks for the pointer @aselle, and thanks for the clear bug report @hugman!

Indeed we can't dedicate much time to supporting tf.contrib code, especially not with XLA at the moment.

However I **am** interested in looking into this issue, since it may uncover weird bugs.  @hugman, can you provide a log of the same code **with XLA disabled**, to let me know what normal convergence looks like for you?

I can't promise when I'll have time to take a look, but it'll be useful for a rainy day, just not today.  :)
